comments.comments_text: Referee William Collum points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. Cherif Ndiaye (Crvena zvezda) goes wild in celebration. Goal! A sublime pass across goal by Osman Bukari evaded the goalkeeper and allowed Cherif Ndiaye (Crvena zvezda) to tap the ball into an empty net. 1:0.
